main event: Observers reported multiple sightings of unidentified flying objects over Sierra Vista, Arizona, from various dates in the 1960s.
interesting points: The first sighting involved a bright white 'flying saucer' reported by a civilian,The observer saw a 'flying saucer' once before,One description included an object moving at 1000-3000 mph,The sighting involved a reliable science teacher who noted the object's speed and maneuverability were unlike any conventional aircraft,Another report described a massive dark grey cigar-shaped object hovering at 75 feet off the ground for 3-4 minutes before taking off rapidly.
sighted object: bright white flying saucer, metallic object, dark grey cigar-shaped object
witness description: civilian and a science teacher, all considered reliable sources
